column2: se_repDur = sd(repDur)/sqrt(n-1)), aes(x=curDur, y = m_repDur-curDur, group = WMSize, color = WMSize))  +
#geom_errorbar(width=.2,  aes(ymin = m_repDur - se_repDur, ymax = m_repDur + se_repDur)) +
labs(x="Sample intervals (s)", y="Reproduction bias in Exp 4b(s)", shape=" ", color = "Memory Load")+
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'curDur', 'WMSize'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
